channel.title: Changeing the bitmap
channel.description:
help anybody on how to change the bitmap for wizzups powerminer, so it will click the click here to play button instead if just siting there not clicking it.
If sombody would just post out the line were his old one was.. That would help me out alot.

item.title: Changeing the bitmap
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

The click to play function isn’t in Wizzy’s script, but in SRL itself.

Check to make sure you have updated to the most recent version of SRL, that bug was fixed.

If you still can’t get it to work after updating, go ahead and contact me on AIM/MSN

Read full topic
